forms.subject: Subject
forms.name: Name

forms.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
forms.formError: There was an error submitting the form

errors.contactSupport: Please contact support if the problem persists

footer.description: Alternative venue rentals for creative projects and events.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

accountSettings.subtitle: Manage your account settings, personal information, and preferences
accountSettings.updatePersonalDesc: Keep your name, email, and contact details up to date
accountSettings.privacySettingsDesc: Control what information is shared and visible
accountSettings.paymentMethodsDesc: Manage your payout methods and settings

personal.title: Personal information
personal.subtitle: Your personal information is private and secure
personal.phoneDesc: Add a number so confirmed guests and MusicTraveler can get in touch. You can add other numbers and choose how they're used.

login.title: Login & security
login.subtitle: Keep your account safe and secure

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Control your privacy and data settings
privacy.readReceiptsDesc: Show people when I've read their messages.
privacy.includeListings: Include my listing(s) in search engines
privacy.searchEnginesDesc: Turning this on means search engines, like Google, will display your listing page(s) in search results.
privacy.allowSearchEngines: Allow search engines to index my listings
privacy.reviewsDesc: Choose what's shared when you write a review. Updating this setting will change what's displayed for all past reviews.
privacy.homeCity: Show my home city and country
privacy.exampleTripType: Ex: Stayed with kids or pets
privacy.exampleStay: Ex: A few nights, about a week, etc.
privacy.exampleServices: Ex: Gourmet brunch or tasting menu
privacy.requestDataDesc: Download a copy of your personal data
privacy.cookieDesc: Control what type of cookies you'd like to allow on MusicTraveler
privacy.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
privacy.privacyDesc: MusicTraveler is committed to keeping your data protected. See details in our
privacy.privacyFooter: To help us improve your experience, share your feedback.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.subtitle: Manage your tax information and documents
taxes.taxInfoDesc: Tax info is required for most countries/regions.
taxes.vatDesc: If you are VAT-registered, please add your VAT ID.
taxes.gstDesc: Add your registered GST, HST, and other local tax ID numbers.
taxes.helpDesc: Get answers to questions about taxes in our Help Centre.
taxes.documentsDesc: Tax documents required for filing taxes are available to review and download here.
taxes.earningsInfo: You can also file taxes using detailed earnings info, available in the earnings summary.
taxes.priorDocs: For tax documents issued prior to 2021, contact us.

payments.title: Payments
payments.subtitle: Manage your payment methods and transaction history
payments.trackPayments: Keep track of all your payments and refunds.
payments.addMethod: Add a payment method using our secure Stripe payment system, then start planning your next trip.
payments.secureDesc: Always pay and communicate through MusicTraveler to ensure you're protected under our Terms of Service, Payments Terms of Service, cancellation, and other safeguards.
payments.payoutMethodsDesc: Add or update how you want to receive your payouts via Stripe
payments.payoutScheduleDesc: Choose when you want to receive your payouts
payments.payoutNote: Payouts are processed via Stripe within 2-3 business days

preferences.title: Languages & currency
preferences.subtitle: Manage your language, currency, and regional preferences
preferences.dateTimeDesc: Configure how dates and times are displayed
preferences.autoTranslateDesc: Automatically translate content to your preferred language
preferences.originalCurrencyDesc: Display the original currency alongside your preferred currency

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose what you want to be notified about and how
notifications.recognitionDesc: Learn about best hosting practices, and get access to exclusive hosting perks.
notifications.booking: Confirm your booking and account activity, and learn about important policies.
notifications.reminders: Get important reminders about your reservations, listings, and account activity.
notifications.messages: Keep in touch with hosts and guests before, during, and after your reservation.
